name: IOSU!
description:
Play rhythm game with your beatmap files. :)
Currently 4 Keys mode & 5x5 Keys mode are available!!
Other modes will be available soon!!

How to upload Beatmap files!
1. Connect your iDevice and PC(Mac) to the same WI-FI network.
2. Open provided URL on your PC(Mac).
3. Upload your OSZ files.
